title: The Jade Falcon Mystery
synopsis: In the rain-soaked streets of Noirville, 1947. A down-on-your-luck private detective, a mysterious case, and secrets that run deeper than the fog.
setting: A noir-style 1940s city called Noirville, filled with shadowy alleys, smoky jazz clubs, and characters with secrets to hide. Rain is always threatening, streetlights flicker, and everyone has an angle.

starting_location.name: Detective's Office
starting_location.description: A cramped office on the third floor of the Baxter Building. A frosted glass door reads 'Private Investigations'. Inside, a battered wooden desk drowns in papers, a half-empty bottle of bourbon sits in the drawer, and the ceiling fan wobbles with each rotation. The window overlooks the wet streets below.
starting_location.visual_description: Small 1940s detective office, frosted glass door, cluttered wooden desk, ceiling fan, rain-streaked window, filing cabinets, noir lighting

main_character.name: Sam Noir
main_character.description: A weathered private detective with a sharp mind and a troubled past. Wearing a rumpled trench coat and a fedora that's seen better days. Eyes that have seen too much, but still searching for the truth.

goal: Create a classic noir detective story with mystery, intrigue, and dramatic twists.
visual_style: noir comic book style, high contrast shadows, rain-slicked streets, 1940s aesthetic, dramatic angles, moody lighting
world_rules: This is a realistic noir setting - no magic or supernatural elements
The weather reflects the mood - rain, fog, dim streetlights
